description: Unrecognisable by its emptiness during lockdown, Paris rediscovers its raison d'¨ºtre.
title: Coronavirus: Paris returns to cafe life with new normal
title_page: Coronavirus: Paris returns to cafe life with new normal - BBC News
maintext: There was something about the emptiness of this city, in particular, during lockdown that felt especially poignant, says Joan Dejean, an author and historian of French culture, because the destiny of Paris was to be seen: "Paris was intentionally constructed for people in the streets, to be viewed, to be appreciated visually," she told me.
